menu: Click 'Play as Attacker' to start the demo.
start:
Click the button to start probing
the network.
ip:
Locate and enter the IP addresses for
the submarine and the submarine controller to start
sniffing for activity.
encoding: decoding the packets. 'utf-8' is a good idea.
fields:
Find significant field names
in the decoded packets. If you track enough
fields, the packet stream can simulate the
submarine.
endgame:
Now start sending cyber attacks
to trick the submarine and controller. Expand the
right sidebar if you've closed it.
